text: Claude Estier (8 June 1925 â€“ 10 March 2016),CV at Senate website . born Claude Hasday Ezratty, was a French politician and journalist. He was deputy of Paris in 1967-1968 and again in 1981-1986. He was then Senator from 1986 to 2004 and was President of the Socialist group in the Senate from 1988 to 2004. In 1955 he joined the political redaction of Le Monde. He quit in 1958. ==Note== ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Writers from Paris Category:French journalists Category:Socialists Category:Politicians from Paris
title: Claude Estier
